scripts.test_normal: echo "Please check output tests/*.md!" && node ploc-cli.js -d -i "tests/*.*(pks|sql)"
scripts.test_autoHeaderIds: echo "Please check output tests/*.md!" && node ploc-cli.js -d -i "tests/*.*(pks|sql)" --autoHeaderIds "float: right;"
scripts.test_tocStyles: echo "Please check output tests/*.md!" && node ploc-cli.js -d -i "tests/*.*(pks|sql)" --tocStyles "float: right;"
scripts.test_autoHeaderIds_and_tocStyles: echo "Please check output tests/*.md!" && node ploc-cli.js -d -i "tests/*.*(pks|sql)" --autoHeaderIds --tocStyles "float: right;"
scripts.test_folder: echo "Please check output out/*.md!" && node ploc-cli.js -d -i "tests/*.*(pks|sql)" -o out/{file}.md
